item.title: By: mimoymima
item.dc:creator: mimoymima
item.description: Thanks for the compliment Luis! Just curious, which links are you talking about? The feedback and suggest grants buttons?
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the compliment Luis! Just curious, which links are you talking about? The feedback and suggest grants buttons?

item.title: By: Luis Larrea
item.dc:creator: Luis Larrea
item.description: Looks pretty good. Kudos on getting it done and out the door. The only thing I dislike is the right side shadow gradient on the links.
item.content:encoded: Looks pretty good. Kudos on getting it done and out the door. The only thing I dislike is the right side shadow gradient on the links.
